title: Ep 159 | Phil Is a Census Taker's Nightmare, Jase Is Facially Profiled & Don't Make Texas a Hellhole
description:
Phil raises an eyebrow at what people are bringing to Texas from blue states. A visitor at Phil's gate asks a peculiar question about his race. Jase's new neighbor in Texas doesn't seem to like him very much, but he has a great visit to Garrett Metal Detectors. And the guys talk about bearing good fruit, explaining the Holy Spirit to unbelievers, getting out of the way of the Holy Spirit, and what it means to be controlled by a sinful nature.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
